languages.text: Посреди лагеря топорщится месиво из скрюченных тел — все спутаны одной шипастой цепью.

traits.locale_text: Посреди лагеря топорщится месиво из скрюченных тел — все спутаны одной шипастой цепью.

languages.text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.
languages.original_text: Посреди лагеря топорщится месиво из скрюченных тел — все спутаны одной шипастой цепью.

traits.locale_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.
A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.
A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.
A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.
A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

languages.text: 营地中间竖立着一堆歪歪扭扭的尸体，被一条带刺的铁链捆在一起。
languages.original_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

traits.locale_text: 营地中间竖立着一堆歪歪扭扭的尸体，被一条带刺的铁链捆在一起。

languages.text: Una masa informe de cuerpos retorcidos se alza en medio del campamento, unida por una única cadena recubierta de púas.
languages.original_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

traits.locale_text: Una masa informe de cuerpos retorcidos se alza en medio del campamento, unida por una única cadena recubierta de púas.

languages.text: 曲がりくねった死体の数々が無造作に、とがった鎖一本で繋がれた状態でキャンプの中心に飾られている。
languages.original_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

traits.locale_text: 曲がりくねった死体の数々が無造作に、とがった鎖一本で繋がれた状態でキャンプの中心に飾られている。

languages.text: Une masse informe de cadavres se dresse au milieu du camp, tous reliés par une même chaîne à pointes.
languages.original_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

traits.locale_text: Une masse informe de cadavres se dresse au milieu du camp, tous reliés par une même chaîne à pointes.

languages.text: Eine formlose Masse verrenkter Körper ragt in der Mitte des Lagers nach oben, zusammengehalten durch eine einzige Kette mit Dornen.
languages.original_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

traits.locale_text: Eine formlose Masse verrenkter Körper ragt in der Mitte des Lagers nach oben, zusammengehalten durch eine einzige Kette mit Dornen.

languages.text: Kampın ortasında tek bir dikenli zincirle bağlanmış, şekilsiz bir ceset yığını duruyor.
languages.original_text: A shapeless mass of crooked bodies sticks up in the middle of the camp, bound by a single spiked chain.

traits.locale_text: Kampın ortasında şekilsiz bir ceset yığını duruyor, tek bir dikenli zincirle bağlanmışlar.
